text: "The resumption of indoor dining is a vexing milestone on New York City’s jagged path to recovery," @hels writes. Absent any meaningful federal support, the work of propping up devastated industries falls to the states and cities. https://t.co/CU9AMy0AS2

text: “Congratulations on being about to be 80,” we said. “Save them,” P. G. Wodehouse, who was born on this day in 1881, said. “I’m going to be 79. . . . However, I am working on my 80th book.” https://t.co/FyfzuiUexT
